concept.title: Transliteration

conbody.p: To enter and edit the transliteration of your texts, click into the Text Editor window in the upper centre of the User Interface and enter your text. Use the keyboard layout provided by BBAW preferably. To change your keyboard layout, you have to change it in your operating system.

You need to follow the system grammar, so that no error message occurs. The most important rule before beginning: Enter two "ยง" and write between them to mark a sentence's beginning and end. If these symbols miss, you will recieve an error message instantly.
